content.json:
## Risk Detections (Azure AD B2C)

This report uses Azure AD B2C Sign-in logs to capture risk detections and related data. 
Risk detection is part of the Azure Identity Protection which requires Azure AD Premium P2 license.

Learn more about risk detection: [Risk detection and remediation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/identity-protection/overview-identity-protection#risk-detection-and-remediation). 

Access this and other Azure AD B2C workbooks on [GitHub](https://aka.ms/b2csiem).

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where IPAddress !in (split('{FilterByIPAddress}',","))
| where RiskLevelDuringSignIn in (split('{FilterBySignInRiskLevel}',","))
| where Location in (split('{FilterByCountry}',",")) 
| project TimeGenerated, CorrelationId,  IPAddress, Location, UserDisplayName, RiskEventTypes_V2, RiskEventTypes, RiskDetail, RiskState, IsRisky, RiskLevelAggregated, RiskLevelDuringSignIn, UserId
| project RiskLevelDuringSignIn
| summarize Total= count() by RiskLevelDuringSignIn
content.title: Sign-in risk levels

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where RiskLevelDuringSignIn != "none"
| where IPAddress !in (split('{FilterByIPAddress}',","))
| where RiskLevelDuringSignIn in (split('{FilterBySignInRiskLevel}',","))
| where Location in (split('{FilterByCountry}',",")) 
| project TimeGenerated, CorrelationId, RiskLevelDuringSignIn,  IPAddress, Location, UserDisplayName, RiskEventTypes_V2, RiskEventTypes, RiskDetail, RiskState, IsRisky, RiskLevelAggregated, UserId
| summarize count() by  RiskLevelDuringSignIn, Location
content.title: Total sign-in risk events by country

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where RiskState == "atRisk" 
| where IPAddress !in (split('{FilterByIPAddress}',","))
| where RiskLevelDuringSignIn in (split('{FilterBySignInRiskLevel}',","))
| where Location in (split('{FilterByCountry}',",")) 
| extend RiskEvent = tolower(RiskEventTypes_V2)
| extend User = tolower(Identity)
| extend locationDetailsJSON = parse_json(LocationDetails)
| extend Latitude=tostring(locationDetailsJSON.geoCoordinates.latitude), Longitude=tostring(locationDetailsJSON.geoCoordinates.longitude)
| extend GeoCoordinatesMapLink = strcat("https://bing.com/maps/default.aspx?cp=",Latitude,"~",Longitude,"&style=h&lvl=15&sp=","point.",Latitude,"_",Longitude,"_",User)
| project IPAddress, Location, Latitude, Longitude, GeoCoordinatesMapLink, RiskLevelDuringSignIn
| summarize Total = count() by IPAddress,Latitude, Longitude, GeoCoordinatesMapLink, RiskLevelDuringSignIn, Location
| order by Total desc
content.title: Total sign-in risk events by IP address

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where RiskState == "atRisk" 
| where IPAddress !in (split('{FilterByIPAddress}',","))
| where RiskLevelDuringSignIn in (split('{FilterBySignInRiskLevel}',","))
| where Location in (split('{FilterByCountry}',",")) 
| extend RiskEvent = tolower(RiskEventTypes_V2)
| extend locationDetailsJSON = parse_json(LocationDetails)
| extend Latitude=tostring(locationDetailsJSON.geoCoordinates.latitude), Longitude=tostring(locationDetailsJSON.geoCoordinates.longitude)
| extend User = tolower(Identity)
//| project Location, Latitude, Longitude, GeoCoordinatesMapLink, Total, IPAddress
| summarize Total = count() by Latitude, Longitude, User, Location, IPAddress
| extend GeoCoordinatesMapLink = strcat("https://bing.com/maps/default.aspx?cp=",Latitude,"~",Longitude,"&style=h&lvl=15&sp=","point.",Latitude,"_",Longitude,"_",User)
| project Location, Latitude, Longitude, GeoCoordinatesMapLink, Total
| order by Total desc

//| extend Latitude=tostring(locationDetailsJSON.geoCoordinates.latitude), Longitude=tostring(locationDetailsJSON.geoCoordinates.longitude)
//| extend GeoCoordinatesLink = strcat("https://bing.com/maps/default.aspx?cp=",Latitude,"~",Longitude,"&style=h&lvl=15&sp=","point.",Latitude,"_",Longitude,"_",Identity)
//| project TimeGenerated,  RiskEvent,  RiskLevelAggregated, UserId, Identity, IPAddress, Location,  Latitude, Longitude, BingMapLink=GeoCoordinatesLink
content.title: Total sign-in risk events by geo coordinates
Total sign-in risk events by B2C policy

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where RiskState == "atRisk" 
| where RiskLevelDuringSignIn != "none" 
| where IPAddress !in (split('{FilterByIPAddress}',","))
| where RiskLevelDuringSignIn in (split('{FilterBySignInRiskLevel}',","))
| where Location in (split('{FilterByCountry}',",")) 
| extend RiskEvent = tolower(RiskEventTypes_V2)
| summarize Total=count() by RiskEventTypes_V2
| order by Total
content.title: Total sign-in risk events by risk detections

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where RiskLevelDuringSignIn != "none"
| where IPAddress !in (split('{FilterByIPAddress}',","))
| where RiskLevelDuringSignIn in (split('{FilterBySignInRiskLevel}',","))
| extend Browser = tostring(DeviceDetail.browser)
| where Browser != ""
| summarize Total = count() by Browser
| order by Total
content.title: Risky sign-ins by browser

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where RiskLevelDuringSignIn != "none"
| where IPAddress !in (split('{FilterByIPAddress}',","))
| where RiskLevelDuringSignIn in (split('{FilterBySignInRiskLevel}',","))
| extend OperatingSystem = tostring(DeviceDetail.operatingSystem)
| where OperatingSystem != ""
| summarize Total = count() by OperatingSystem
| order by Total
content.title: Risky sign-ins by operating system

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where RiskState == "atRisk" 
| where IPAddress !in (split('{FilterByIPAddress}',","))
| where RiskLevelDuringSignIn in (split('{FilterBySignInRiskLevel}',","))
| where Location in (split('{FilterByCountry}',",")) 
| project TimeGenerated, CorrelationId,  IPAddress, Location, UserDisplayName, RiskEventTypes_V2, RiskEventTypes, RiskDetail, RiskState, IsRisky, RiskLevelAggregated, UserId
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated,7d), RiskEventTypes
| render timechart
content.title: Risky sign-ins by risk type over time

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where RiskState == "atRisk" 
| where RiskLevelDuringSignIn != "none" 
| where IPAddress !in (split('{FilterByIPAddress}',","))
| where RiskLevelDuringSignIn in (split('{FilterBySignInRiskLevel}',","))
| where Location in (split('{FilterByCountry}',",")) 
| project RiskEventTypes_V2,RiskLevelDuringSignIn
//| summarize Total=count() by RiskEventTypes_V2, RiskLevelDuringSignIn
| evaluate pivot(RiskLevelDuringSignIn)
//| order by high,medium,low
content.title: Total - Risky sign-ins by risk type and risk level

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where RiskState == "atRisk" 
| where IPAddress !in (split('{FilterByIPAddress}',","))
| where RiskLevelDuringSignIn in (split('{FilterBySignInRiskLevel}',","))
| where Location in (split('{FilterByCountry}',",")) 
| extend RiskEventStr = dynamic({RiskEventTypes_V2Param})
| extend RiskEventTypes_V2Str = translate('\r\n ','',RiskEventTypes_V2) //Removing space and return characters from the risktypes so matching can be done with the parameter value.
| where RiskEventTypes_V2Str == tostring(RiskEventStr)
| extend locationDetailsJSON = parse_json(LocationDetails)
| extend Latitude=tostring(locationDetailsJSON.geoCoordinates.latitude), Longitude=tostring(locationDetailsJSON.geoCoordinates.longitude)
| extend GeoCoordinatesLink = strcat("https://bing.com/maps/default.aspx?cp=",Latitude,"~",Longitude,"&style=h&lvl=15&sp=","point.",Latitude,"_",Longitude,"_",Identity)
| project TimeGenerated, RiskLevelDuringSignIn,RiskEventStr, UserId, Identity, IPAddress, Location,  Latitude, Longitude, BingMapLink=GeoCoordinatesLink, CorrelationId
| order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Details - Risky sign-ins by risk type and risk level

items.name: Risk Events - Filtered by Risk Event Type

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where RiskLevelAggregated != "none"
| where RiskState == "atRisk"
| where IPAddress !in (split('{FilterByIPAddress}',","))
| where Location in (split('{FilterByCountry}',",")) 
| project Identity, UserId, TimeGenerated, UserPrincipalName, RiskLevelAggregated
| summarize RiskHistoryTotal = count() by Identity, SignInIdentifier=UserPrincipalName, UserId
| order by RiskHistoryTotal
//| summarize RiskHistoryTotal = count() by Identity, UserId, SignInIdentifier, RiskLevelAggregated
content.title: Risky users

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where RiskLevelAggregated != "none"
| where RiskEventTypes_V2 != "[]"
| where RiskState == "atRisk"
| where UserId == '{UserIdParam}'
| where IPAddress !in (split('{FilterByIPAddress}',","))
| where Location in (split('{FilterByCountry}',",")) 
| extend RiskState=iff(RiskState=="atRisk", "At Risk", "N/A")
| extend Browser = tostring(DeviceDetail.browser)
| where Browser != ""
| extend OS = tostring(DeviceDetail.operatingSystem)
| where OS != ""
| extend locationDetailsJSON = parse_json(LocationDetails)
| extend Latitude=tostring(locationDetailsJSON.geoCoordinates.latitude), Longitude=tostring(locationDetailsJSON.geoCoordinates.longitude)
| extend GeoCoordinatesLink = strcat("https://bing.com/maps/default.aspx?cp=",Latitude,"~",Longitude,"&style=h&lvl=15&sp=","point.",Latitude,"_",Longitude,"_",Identity)
| distinct TimeGenerated,Identity, RiskState, RiskLevelAggregated, RiskLevelDuringSignIn, RiskEventTypes_V2, Location, IPAddress, Latitude, Longitude , GeoCoordinatesLink, Browser,OS, CorrelationId
| order by TimeGenerated
content.title: Users' risk detections
Risk detection details
Risk detection details
